p: Statistical analysis was performed using SPSS 23. For statistical analysis, a value of 2560 was assigned if the MN titer was ⩾2560. The McNemar test was used in comparing the proportion of serum specimens with ⩾four-fold reduction in the MN titer. The paired-sample t test was used in comparing the geometric mean titers (GMT). Log-transformed MN titers were used for the statistical analysis of the GMT and 95% confidence interval (CI) as we described previously [ 23, 24].
